original_text: As touching our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.
korean_text: 형제 아볼로에 대하여는 그에게 형제들과 함께 너희에게 가라고 내가 많이 권하였으되 지금은 갈 뜻이 전혀 없으나 기회가 있으면 가리라

sentences.original_text: I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 형제들과 함께 그가 너희에게 오기를 매우 원하였으나

sentences.original_text: but his will was not at all to come at this time
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 뜻은 이 때에 오려는 것이 전혀 아니었다

sentences.original_text: when he shall have convenient time
